content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_STOrder') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STOrder
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STOrder (
    [lms_order_id] int,
    [lms_order_corderno] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_order_custref] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_order_pickupcustid] int,
    [lms_order_delivercustid] int,
    [lms_order_billcustid] int,
    [lms_order_weight] numeric(18,2),
    [lms_order_ovalue] numeric(18,2),
    [lms_order_hodate] datetime2(7),
    [lms_order_cservice] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_order_courierid] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_order_custservice] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_order_userid] int,
    [lms_order_appointment] datetime2(7),
    [lms_order_deliverby] datetime2(7),
    [lms_order_onfirmed] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_order_omment] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_order_efno] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_order_edate] datetime2(7),
    [lms_order_tchno] int,
    [lms_order_staccid] int,
    [lms_order_rfreightflag] int,
    [lms_order_ecdel] int,
    [lms_parcelbyorder_aggweight] float,
    [lms_parcelbyorder_aggchargeweight] numeric(18,2),
    [lms_parcelbyorder_aggvolweight] float,
    [lms_parcelbyorder_aggvolumiserweight] numeric(18,2),
    [lms_parcelbyorder_noparcels] bigint,
    [lms_order_maxpoddate] datetime2(7),
    [lms_order_inserviceflag] int,
    [lms_order_actualleaddays] int

	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/OPS/storder.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.T_STOrder 
GO
